title: Fort Smith National Historic Site: Second Fort (1838-1871)
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People     Second Fort (1838-1871)                 People of Second Fort Smith (1838-1871)         Fort Smith during Confederate occupation Fort Smith NHS Collection  In 1838, fourteen years after the first fort was closed, a new garrison was built at Fort Smith. A massive defensive fort was never needed, and Fort Smith eventually served as a supply depot. After the Civil War, the fort had served its usefulness and was ordered closed in 1871.
